node.value:
namespace.node_agent:
  objects:
    GlobalNetwork:
      attrs:
        device_link:
          help: device link
          type: String
        driver:
          help: driver
          type: String
        driver_modules:
          help: driver modules
          type: String
        hw_address:
          help: hardware address
          type: String
        interface:
          help: network interface name
          type: List
        interface_id:
          help: unique id
          type: String
        interface_type:
          help: interface type
          type: String
        ipv4:
          help: ipv4 addresses
          type: List
        ipv6:
          help: ipv6 addresses
          type: List
        link_detected:
          help: link detected
          type: String
        model:
          help: interface model
          type: String
        netmask:
          help: subnet masks
          type: List
        status:
          help: interface status up/down
          type: String
        subnet:
          help: subnet
          type: String
        sysfs_id:
          help: sysfs id
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Global subnet wise network interface
      list: nodes/$NodeContext.node.id/Networks
      value: /networks
namespace.tendrl:
  ceph_provisioner: CephInstallerPlugin
  flows:
    CreateCluster:
      enabled: true
      help: Create a cluster from scratch
      inputs:
        mandatory:
        - Node[]
        - TendrlContext.cluster_name
        - TendrlContext.sds_name
        - TendrlContext.sds_version
        - TendrlContext.cluster_id
        - Cluster.public_network
        - Cluster.cluster_network
        - TendrlContext.integration_id
        - Cluster.node_configuration
        - Cluster.conf_overrides
      run: tendrl.flows.CreateCluster
      type: Create
      uuid: 2f94a48a-05d7-408c-b400-e27827f4eacd
      version: 1
    ImportCluster:
      enabled: true
      help: Import existing Gluster Cluster
      inputs:
        mandatory:
        - Node[]
        - DetectedCluster.sds_pkg_name
        - DetectedCluster.sds_pkg_version
        - TendrlContext.integration_id
      run: tendrl.flows.ImportCluster
      type: Create
      uuid: 2f94a48a-05d7-408c-b400-e27827f4edef
      version: 1
  gluster_provisioner: GdeployPlugin
  min_reqd_ceph_ver: 10.2.5
  min_reqd_gluster_ver: 3.9.0
  objects:
    Cluster:
      attrs:
        cluster_network:
          help: Data Nework cidr of the cluster
        conf_overrides:
          help: Configuration overrides for the cluster
          type: String
        node_configuration:
          help: Node configuration for the cluster nodes
          type: String
        public_network:
          help: Public Network cidr of the cluster
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Represents a cluster
      internal: true
      list: /clusters
    ClusterNodeContext:
      attrs:
        fqdn:
          help: FQDN of the Tendrl managed node
          type: String
        machine_id:
          help: Unique /etc/machine-id
          type: String
        node_id:
          help: Tendrl ID for the managed node
          type: String
        status:
          help: Node status
          type: String
        tags:
          help: The tags associated with this node
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Cluster leval Node Context
      list: clusters/$TendrlContext.integration_id/nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/NodeContext
      value: clusters/$TendrlContext.integration_id/nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/NodeContext
    ClusterTendrlContext:
      attrs:
        cluster_id:
          help: FSID (Ceph) or Gluster specific ID
          type: String
        cluster_name:
          help: Name of the cluster
          type: String
        integration_id:
          help: Tendrl managed/generated cluster id for the sds being managed by Tendrl
          type: String
        node_id:
          help: Tendrl ID for the managed node
          type: String
        sds_name:
          help: 'Name of the Tendrl managed sds, eg: ''gluster'''
          type: String
        sds_version:
          help: 'Version of the Tendrl managed sds, eg: ''3.2.1'''
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Tendrl context
      value: clusters/$TendrlContext.integration_id/TendrlContext
    Cpu:
      attrs:
        architecture:
          type: String
        cores_per_socket:
          type: String
        cpu_family:
          type: String
        cpu_op_mode:
          type: String
        model:
          type: String
        model_name:
          type: String
        vendor_id:
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: CPU
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Cpu
    DetectedCluster:
      attrs:
        detected_cluster_id:
          help: Temporary id for the sds which is detected in Tendrl
          type: String
        detected_cluster_name:
          help: Name of the sds which is detected in Tendrl
          type: String
        sds_pkg_name:
          help: Storage system package name
          type: String
        sds_pkg_version:
          help: Storage system package version
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: DetectedCluster
      list: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/DetectedCluster
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/DetectedCluster
    Disk:
      attrs:
        Model:
          help: disk model name
          type: String
        alignement:
          help: alignement
          type: String
        bios_id:
          help: Bios id
          type: String
        device:
          help: device
          type: String
        device_files:
          help: device files
          type: String
        device_name:
          help: disk name
          type: String
        device_number:
          help: device number
          type: String
        discard_align_offset:
          help: discard align offset
          type: String
        discard_granularity:
          help: discard granularity
          type: String
        discard_max_bytes:
          help: discard max bytes
          type: String
        discard_zeroes_data:
          help: discard zeroes data
          type: String
        disk_id:
          help: disk unique id
          type: String
        disk_kernel_name:
          help: disk internal kernel name
          type: String
        disk_type:
          help: disk type
          type: String
        drive_status:
          help: disk status
          type: String
        driver:
          help: driver
          type: String
        driver_modules:
          help: driver modules
          type: String
        fstype:
          help: file system type
          type: String
        fsuuid:
          help: file system uuid
          type: String
        geo_bios_edd:
          help: geometry bios edd
          type: String
        geo_bios_legacy:
          help: geometry bios legacy
          type: String
        geo_logical:
          help: geometry logical
          type: String
        group:
          help: disk group
          type: String
        label:
          help: label
          type: String
        log_sector_size:
          help: logical sector size
          type: String
        major_to_minor_no:
          help: major to minor number
          type: String
        min_io_size:
          help: min I/O size
          type: String
        mode:
          help: driver mode
          type: String
        mount_point:
          help: disk mount point
          type: String
        optimal_io_size:
          help: optimal I/O size
          type: String
        owner:
          help: driver owner
          type: String
        parent_id:
          help: disk parent id
          type: String
        parent_name:
          help: disk parent name
          type: String
        phy_sector_size:
          help: physical sector size
          type: String
        read_ahead:
          help: read ahead
          type: String
        read_only:
          help: disk is read only or not
          type: String
        removable_device:
          help: removable device or not
          type: String
        req_queue_size:
          help: request queue size
          type: String
        rmversion:
          help: disk firmeware version
          type: String
        scheduler_name:
          help: scheduler_name
          type: String
        serial_no:
          help: disk serial number
          type: String
        size:
          help: size of the disk
          type: Integer
        ssd:
          help: ssd is true / not
          type: String
        state:
          help: disk state
          type: String
        sysfs_busid:
          help: sysfs bus id
          type: String
        sysfs_device_link:
          help: sysfs device link
          type: String
        sysfs_id:
          help: sysfs id
          type: String
        used:
          help: disk used or not True/False
          type: String
        vendor:
          help: disk vendor name
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Disk
      list: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Disks
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Disks
    Job:
      attrs:
        errors:
          help: any errors occured or not
          type: String
        job_id:
          help: job unique id
          type: String
        payload:
          help: dict
          type: Dict
        status:
          help: job current status
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: jobs
      list: /queue
      value: /queue
    Memory:
      attrs:
        total_size:
          type: String
        total_swap:
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Node Memory
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Memory
    Node:
      atoms:
        CheckNodeUp:
          enabled: true
          help: Checks if a node is up
          inputs:
            mandatory:
            - Node.fqdn
          name: check whether the node is up
          outputs:
          - Node.status
          run: tendrl.objects.Node.atoms.CheckNodeUp
          type: Create
          uuid: eda0b13a-7362-48d5-b5ca-4b6d6533a5ab
        Cmd:
          enabled: true
          help: Executes a command
          inputs:
            mandatory:
            - Node.cmd_str
          name: Execute CMD on Node
          outputs:
          - Node.status
          run: tendrl.objects.Node.atoms.Cmd
          type: Create
          uuid: dc8fff3a-34d9-4786-9282-55eff6abb6c3
      attrs:
        cmd_str:
          type: String
        fqdn:
          type: String
        status:
          type: Boolean
      enabled: true
      help: Node
      list: nodes/
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Node
    NodeContext:
      attrs:
        fqdn:
          help: FQDN of the Tendrl managed node
          type: String
        machine_id:
          help: Unique /etc/machine-id
          type: String
        node_id:
          help: Tendrl ID for the managed node
          type: String
        status:
          help: Node status
          type: String
        tags:
          help: The tags associated with this node
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Node Context
      list: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/NodeContext
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/NodeContext
    NodeNetwork:
      attrs:
        device_link:
          help: device link
          type: String
        driver:
          help: driver
          type: String
        driver_modules:
          help: driver modules
          type: String
        hw_address:
          help: hardware address
          type: String
        interface:
          help: network interface name
          type: List
        interface_id:
          help: unique id
          type: String
        interface_type:
          help: interface type
          type: String
        ipv4:
          help: ipv4 addresses
          type: List
        ipv6:
          help: ipv6 addresses
          type: List
        link_detected:
          help: link detected
          type: String
        model:
          help: interface model
          type: String
        netmask:
          help: subnet masks
          type: List
        status:
          help: interface status up/down
          type: String
        subnet:
          help: subnet
          type: String
        sysfs_id:
          help: sysfs id
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Node wise network interface
      list: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Networks
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Networks
    Os:
      attrs:
        kernel_version:
          type: String
        os:
          type: String
        os_version:
          type: String
        selinux_mode:
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: OS
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Os
    Platform:
      attrs:
        kernel_version:
          type: String
        os:
          type: String
        os_version:
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Platform of the Node
      list: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Platform
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Platform
    Service:
      atoms:
        CheckServiceStatus:
          enabled: true
          help: check whether the service is running
          inputs:
            mandatory:
            - Node.fqdn
            - Service.name
          name: check whether the service is running
          outputs:
          - status
          run: tendrl.objects.Service.atoms.CheckServiceStatus
          type: Create
          uuid: eda0b13a-7362-48d5-b5ca-4b6d6533a5ab
      attrs:
        exists:
          type: String
        running:
          type: String
        service:
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Service
      list: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Services
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/Services
    TendrlContext:
      attrs:
        cluster_id:
          help: UUID of the cluster
          type: String
        cluster_name:
          help: Name of the cluster
          type: String
        integration_id:
          help: Tendrl managed/generated cluster id for the sds being managed by Tendrl
          type: String
        node_id:
          help: Tendrl ID for the managed node
          type: String
        sds_name:
          help: 'Name of the Tendrl managed sds, eg: ''gluster'''
          type: String
        sds_version:
          help: 'Version of the Tendrl managed sds, eg: ''3.2.1'''
          type: String
      enabled: true
      help: Tendrl context
      value: nodes/$NodeContext.node_id/TendrlContext
tendrl_schema_version: 0.3
